person.note: Lou(2) Yue [3624] He retired from State Council at the time of the nanjiao, which must be 1212. Yuan Xie, WJ, 11.1a-34a. CBD, 5, 3728-9.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1208: Apt. Qianshu Shumi yuan shi (State Council)1208: Promoted to Tongzhi Shumi yuan shi1209: Apt. Canzhi zhengshi1210: Still in office as Canzhi zhengshi (no date of departure).

desc.label: 樓鑰《攻媿集》卷六四《代仲兄（錫）謝監左藏庫門啟》。
